title: If I give Kaffara or Expiation for broken Oaths, must I give it ONLY to MUSLIMS or a charity org?
transcript: ibraim from the usam um yeah if I don't know any homeless people to expediate my vow can I give the clothes or food the 10 clothes to someone else to hand it out to homeless and are they supposed to be Muslims yes the the experation of feeding 10 poor or needy uh people or clothing them must be they must be uh Muslims now if you don't know anyone personally but you know someone you trust who could deliver the clothes or the food to them yes you can do that and most people authorize charity organizations they trust to do this for them in impoverished countries and Allah Knows Best
